channel.title: Programs on DrGwel's Personal Site
channel.description: Recent content in Programs on DrGwel's Personal Site

item.title: Be More Ocean
item.description:
This series of programs aims to introduce and communicate concepts of oceanography through a scientific expedition on the game Sea of ​​Thieves.

Your journey will be led by Professor Ernest Méduse, a talented explorer and ecologist, who will guide you through various programs. Our goal will be to understand how the game's ecosystems work and whether they are scientifically plausible.

Several topics will be discussed:

  • physics (winds and currents)
  • geology
  • water chemistry
  • aquatic biology
  • land biology
  • human civilizations

The expedition Journal is available here.

item.title: Chouettos Cup
item.description:
The Chouettos Cup is a friendly competition offered to the community on Discord and during live broadcasts.

Inspired from the House Cup system in the Harry Potter universe, community members can join one of the three participating Societies during a livestream (random assignment in exchange for a few channel points ):

  • the Collectors of Science
  • the Knowledge Alliance
  • the Ordre of Scholars

Viewer interactions during livestreams can earn or lose points for their Society, and bonus points are awarded through monthly challenges to be completed on the community server. Proposed by the moderation team, these challenges allow everyone to participate by organizing their efforts through dedicated discussion channels.

item.title: InstantOcean
item.description:
InstantOceans are video capsules created live with a science-on-demand format.

Using channel points during a livestream, viewers suggest a topic related to the oceans in the broadest sense: a scientific news, questions about concepts, debates, etc. I then search the internet for information to address the topic and explain it.

The moderators also created “Ocean GuessR,” where they give me clues so I can guess the region represented.

item.title: Chouettos Pass
item.description:
The Chouettos Pass is a level system offered to the community during live broadcasts.

The goal is to accumulate experience to reach levels, which will unlock rewards. To do this, viewers must interact with the stream using their channel points , which will trigger various effects:

  • direct gains
  • science anecdotes competition
  • tchat mini games
  • in-game challenges
  • ...

Reaching levels 3, 5 and 8 unlocks premium command to modify live elements (camera filters, backgrounds, animations, etc.), and level 10 activates a gift card giveaway to use online.
